> The study of the rise and fall of populations, inter- and intraspecific  interactions - with a strong flavor of conservation biology and management. 


### Course Materials

This course is co-taught by Drs. [Elie Gurarie](https://www.esf.edu/faculty/gurarie/) and [Joshua Drew](https://www.esf.edu/faculty/drew/).   This page compiles the lectures, labs, problem sets and links to simulation tools (shiny apps) for Dr. Gurarie's portion of the course (roughly weeks 5-12).
